Changelog:
Build 2024.3.21.981
- Fixed a rare client crash when the game updated and you ran any dll in debug mode. (Thanks belst.)

Build 2024.3.17.1229
- Added Localisation support for QuickAccess Locations.
- Improved Mumble::IsGameplay being set to false when the game freezes.
- Added new strings showing when updates are being checked in the Addons window.
- QuickAccess now lights up if it's set to Extend and the native game icons are hovered.
- Added ArcDPS Integration support even when ArcDPS is not loaded via Nexus e.g. Proxy, Chainload, AddonLoader.
- Added support for user-defined textures. Placing /addons/Nexus/Textures/someIdentifier.png will override when someIdentifier would be loaded instead.
- Added glyph ranges for Cyrillic and some eastern European languages.

Build 2024.3.13.1347
- Added QuickAccessIconsCount (32bit), QuickAccessMode (32bit) and QuickAccessIsVertical (32bit) to NexusLink for external overlays to respect Nexus.

Build 2024.3.13.1235
- Fixed addon item texture not showing when no addons installed.
 -Pass through "Toggle Hide UI" keybind to game.
- Added translation support for most text. English is embedded by default, more translation files can be placed into addons/Nexus/Locales. Naming does not matter only the identifier field, but the default ones will be overwritten on launch.
- Fixed Addon Library freezing the game until finished.

Build 2024.3.9.744
- Implemented Localisation (Keybinds only until full translation)
- Added support for Chinese characters
- Added Translate and TranslateTo to AddonAPI
- Added Addon Version back to overview rather than tooltip
- Added WndProcSendToGame to AddonAPI
- Added option to always show Quick Access (New default is hidden in Character Select / Loading)
